attributes.action: publicly censure Jose Mourinho for his comments about Andrew Johnson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hereby petition the Prime Minister to publicly censure the Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho for his remarks made concerning the Everton footballer Andy Johnson following the game between the two clubs on Sunday 17 December 2006. 

Jose Mourinho has increasingly been stretching the boundaries of what are reasonable comments a Premiership manager can make this season, and we feel it time that he should be taught a lesson. This would be the perfect way for Tony Blair to sign off his own premiership.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
